snippet: Two victims identify a man caught on a surveillance camera as their attacker.
abstract: New York Police Department releases a video, hoping to identify a man who they say lured three women to separate spots in Brooklyn in last two weeks and raped them; investigators are certain that the same person is behind all of the attacks.
lead_paragraph: Two victims identify a man caught on a surveillance camera as their attacker.

headline.seo: Brooklyn Rapist Strikes Three Times in Two Weeks
headline.main: Man Sought in 3 Brooklyn Rapes in 2 Weeks
headline.print_headline: Man Sought in 3 Brooklyn Rapes in 2 Weeks
